dublin_core.dcvalue: Current problems and solutions to establish health telematics and telemedicine for patient s seamless care have been analysed referring to experiences of advanced institutions especially in but not restricted to the USA In that context problems at institutional boundaries as well as technical and personal problems for communication and co operation have been explored Entering coded clinical data and the ubiquitous access to that information are crucial challenges to be met
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:36:10Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2004-04-05
Studies in health technology and informatics
Health telematics and telemedicine for improving patients' care.
